name: Swarm of Rats
conditionImmunities: Charmed, Frightened, Grappled, Paralyzed, Petrified, Prone, Restrained, Stunned

specialAbilities.name: Keen Smell
specialAbilities.description: The swarm has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

specialAbilities.name: Swarm
specialAbilities.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: . Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 7 (2d6) piercing damage, or 3 (1d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
